statements: UPDATE transactions SET amount = 150.75, location = 'New York' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;

UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1500.75, is_fraudulent = false WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE transactions SET location = 'New York', amount = 2000.50 WHERE timestamp = '2023-01-20 10:30:00';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE anomalies SET anomaly_reason = 'Duplicate transaction detected' WHERE anomaly_id = 3;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50, transaction_time = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 12345
